Name: Eloriasha
About the game: Inspired by the 8/16-bit classics; Eloriasha is a difficult, 'die and retry' old school action-platformer about a man's crazy journey to save the world. Run, jump, attack, slide and shoot your way through 6 action-packed levels! Also included is... - That Awesome 8/16-bit Retro Feeling - Cool, Creative Stages and Scary Bosses - Beautiful Pixel Art and a Fantastic Soundtrack by Amazing People - A Meaningful Story - Dying a Lot (well, probably...) ...oh, yeah! (:
